snippet: A parrot that spoke with a British accent when he disappeared four years ago has been reunited with his owner, and he now speaks Spanish.
abstract: Parrot that spoke with a British accent when he disappeared in 2010 is reunited with his owner in Torrance, Calif, and he now speaks Spanish.
lead_paragraph: A parrot that spoke with a British accent when he disappeared four years ago has been reunited with his owner, and he now speaks Spanish.

headline.main: California: Bilingual Parrot Silent About Absence
headline.print_headline: California: Bilingual Parrot Silent About Absence
